title: lovely hotel with great staff in a central location
text: my husband and I stayed here for a week in April. It was very clean the bed linen was changed each day.The bathroom and bedroom were spotless.The complimentary breakfast was great.It was layed out beside lift area.It consisted of juice, fruit, yogurt,tea/coffe and pastries. It was really appreciated. You brought it to your room to eat.The staff were very helpful and efficient.If there was a problem it was sorted in a very professional way.I would really recommend this hotel as it was great value.The location is excellent.
